languages.text: "Сначала Администратум не в силах исполнить свой долг и просит помощи, а теперь имеет дерзость критиковать приговоры Вольного Торговца. Префект, ваши обвинения не просто роняют компетентность Администратума, они оспаривают священность решений помазанни{mf|ка|цы} Императора".

"First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."
languages.original_text: "Сначала Администратум не в силах исполнить свой долг и просит помощи, а теперь имеет дерзость критиковать приговоры Вольного Торговца. Префект, ваши обвинения не просто роняют компетентность Администратума, они оспаривают священность решений помазанни{mf|ка|цы} Императора".

traits.locale_text: "First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

"First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

"First, the Administratum is unable to solve cases on its own, and now it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

"First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

"First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

"First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

"First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

languages.text: "Erst kann das Administratum seine Pflicht nicht erfüllen und bittet um Hilfe ... und jetzt hat es die Kühnheit, die Urteile{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu kritisieren. Präfektin, Eure Anschuldigungen werfen nicht nur Fragen hinsichtlich der Kompetenz des Administratums auf, sondern stellen auch die Heiligkeit der Entscheidungen {mf|des|der} Gesalbten des Imperators infrage."
languages.original_text: "First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: "Erst kann das Administratum seine Pflicht nicht erfüllen und bittet um Hilfe ... und jetzt hat es die Kühnheit, die Urteile{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu kritisieren. Präfektin, Eure Anschuldigungen werfen nicht nur Fragen hinsichtlich der Kompetenz des Administratums auf, sondern stellen auch die Heiligkeit der Entscheidungen {mf|des|der} Gesalbten des Imperators infrage."

"Erst kann das Administratum seine Fälle nicht selbst lösen und jetzt wagt es, die Urteile {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu kritisieren. Präfektin, Eure Anschuldigungen werfen nicht nur Fragen hinsichtlich der Kompetenz des Administratums auf, sondern stellen auch die Heiligkeit der Entscheidungen {mf|des|der} Gesalbten des Imperators infrage."

languages.text: « En premier lieu, l'Administratum n'est pas capable d'accomplir son devoir et est contrainte de faire appel à une aide extérieure. Et maintenant, elle a l'audace de critiquer les verdicts {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? Préfète, vos accusations ne se contentent pas de jeter le discrédit sur les compétences de l'Administratum, elles remettent en cause la sainteté des décisions de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: « En premier lieu, l'Administratum n'est pas capable d'accomplir son devoir et est contrainte de faire appel à une aide extérieure. Et maintenant, elle a l'audace de critiquer les verdicts {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? Préfète, vos accusations ne se contentent pas de jeter le discrédit sur les compétences de l'Administratum, elles remettent en cause la sainteté des décisions de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. »

« En premier lieu, l'Administratum n'est pas capable de résoudre des affaires sans aide extérieure. Et elle a maintenant l'audace de critiquer les verdicts {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ? Préfète, vos accusations ne se contentent pas de jeter le discrédit sur les compétences de l'Administratum, elles remettent en cause la sainteté des décisions de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: “内政部先是无力履行职责，请求行商浪人帮忙，现在又厚颜无耻地批判行商浪人做出的裁决。行政官，你当下的指控不仅是在诋毁帝国内政部的能力，更是在挑战帝皇的神选者做出的圣裁。”
languages.original_text: "First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: “内政部先是无力履行职责，请求行商浪人帮忙，现在又厚颜无耻地批判行商浪人做出的裁决。行政官，你当下的指控不仅是在诋毁帝国内政部的能力，更是在挑战帝皇的神选者做出的圣裁。”
“内政部先是能力不足，无法自行解决案件，现在又厚颜无耻地批判行商浪人做出的裁决。行政官，你当下的指控不仅是在诋毁帝国内政部的能力，更是在挑战帝皇的神选者做出的圣裁。”

languages.text: «Primero el Administratum es incapaz de cumplir con su deber y nos pide ayuda, y ahora tiene el descaro de criticar los veredictos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Prefecta, sus acusaciones no solo generan dudas sobre la competencia del Administratum, sino que además cuestionan la santidad de las decisiones de los ungidos del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: «Primero el Administratum es incapaz de cumplir con su deber y nos pide ayuda, y ahora tiene el descaro de criticar los veredictos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Prefecta, sus acusaciones no solo generan dudas sobre la competencia del Administratum, sino que además cuestionan la santidad de las decisiones de los ungidos del Emperador».

«Primero el Administratum es incapaz de resolver sus casos por separado, y ahora tiene el descaro de criticar los veredictos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Prefecta, sus acusaciones no solo generan dudas sobre la competencia del Administratum, sino que además cuestionan la santidad de las decisiones de los ungidos del Emperador».

languages.text: 「まず第一に、帝国行政局は職務を果たせず助けを求めたくせに、今になってローグトレーダーの判決を批判するとは厚かましい。総監、お前の非難は単に帝国行政局の能力に疑いを投げかけるだけでなく、皇帝陛下に聖別されし者の決断の神聖さそのものをおびやかしている」
languages.original_text: "First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: 「まず第一に、帝国行政局は職務を果たせず助けを求めたくせに、今になってローグトレーダーの判決を批判するとは厚かましい。総監、お前の非難は単に帝国行政局の能力に疑いを投げかけるだけでなく、皇帝陛下に聖別されし者の決断の神聖さそのものをおびやかしている」

languages.text: "Administratum; kendi vazifesi yerine getiremeyip yardım istemekle kalmıyor, Hür Tacir'in verdiği hükümleri eleştirme cüretini de kendinde buluyor. Prefekt... Bu suçlamalarla Administratum'un kabiliyetine leke sürmenin yanı sıra İmparator'un kutsadığı birinin aldığı kararların kutsallığına da dil uzatıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "First, the Administratum is unable to do its duty and asks for help, and now, it has the audacity to criticise the verdicts of the Rogue Trader. Prefect, your accusations do not merely cast aspersions on the competence of the Administratum, they challenge the sanctity of the decisions of the Emperor's anointed."

traits.locale_text: "Administratum; kendi vazifesi yerine getiremeyip yardım istemekle kalmıyor, Hür Tacir'in verdiği hükümleri eleştirme cüretini de kendinde buluyor. Prefekt... Bu suçlamalarla Administratum'un kabiliyetine leke sürmenin yanı sıra İmparator'un kutsadığı birinin aldığı kararların kutsallığına da dil uzatıyorsun."

"Administratum; kendi davalarını neticelendirmekten âciz olmakla kalmıyor, Hür Tacir'in verdiği hükümleri eleştirme cüretini de kendinde buluyor. Prefekt... Bu suçlamalarla Administratum'un kabiliyetine leke sürmenin yanı sıra İmparator'un kutsadığı birinin aldığı kararların kutsallığına da dil uzatıyorsun."
